extendedInfo.description: OverviewinPractice provides insight and practical recommendations for the care of patients with viral hepatitis.Subject Matter: Viral HepatitisDesigned forPhysicians and other healthcare professionals including:â¢	Hepatology, gastroenterology, and infectious diseases specialistsâ¢	Residents/fellowsâ¢	Other specialists managing patients with liver diseaseâ¢	Nurses, nurse practitioners, and physician assistants caring for patients with liver diseaseâ¢	Primary care practitioners caring for patients with liver diseaseKey Components â¢	Expert-authored, comprehensive reference work on viral hepatitisâ¢	Continuously updated to incorporate latest findings and best practicesâ¢	Complete drug database (by Lexi-Comp; includes all FDA-approved drugs)â¢	Practice guidelinesâ¢	Relevant PubMed abstracts (MEDLINE)â¢	ClinicalTrials.govIn PracticeâNot Just in TheoryTranslates the constant stream of latest developments in viral hepatitis into clinically applicable information.â¢	Search and find targeted recommendations for your patient care questionsâ¢	Know that the evidence supports your decisionsEfficiently CurrentIntegrates insightful Conference Coverage, drug developments, journal citations, and guidelines to keep you abreast of the developments you can apply to practice. Education With RelevanceEarn CME credit for the topics youâre searching anyway. (To claim credit, just visit the free, companion Web site.)Additional Features	â¢	Easily share information with colleagues or traineesâ¢	Integrated bookmark function for quick return access to key topicsâ¢	Companion Web site includedHow to Gain AccessFree, one-time registration or use your existing Clinical Care Options member ID. (Your information will not be shared or sold to third parties.)

reviews.comment: Great app but the textbook text is too large, margins are too wide and text Is not scaleable on the s3 makIng reading uncomfortable. Please fix!
